Newcastle Exhibition Contest 0 Test Piece Contest
newcastle-exhibition-contest

The Merry Wives of Windsor [Keighley]
Exhibition Park, Newcastle Prizes - 1st £25 and cup, 2nd £12 and shield, 3rd £7, 4th £4, 5th £1. March contest - 1st Blackhall, 2nd Heworth, 3rd Bentley. Deportment - 1st Hetton, 2nd Middlesbrough. 9 bands competed.
